CustomField.description: A comment entered by the submitter when the request was submitted that can be either a process or step level comment. The comment label is specified by the "Submission Comment 1 Label" field in the related approval process definition.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A comment entered by the submitter when the request was submitted that can be either a process or step level comment. The comment label is specified by the "Submission Comment 1 Label" field in the related approval process definition.
CustomField.label: Submission Comment 1
